<script>
// Countdown Timer
function updateCountdown() {
  const electionDate = new Date("Nov 3, 2026 00:00:00").getTime();
  const now = new Date().getTime();
  const distance = electionDate - now;
  
  const days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
  
  document.getElementById("countdown-timer").innerHTML = `<span class="countdown-number">${days}</span> <span class="countdown-text">days</span>`;
  
  if (distance < 0) {
    document.getElementById("countdown-timer").innerHTML = "TODAY IS THE DAY!";
  }
}

setInterval(updateCountdown, 1000);
updateCountdown();

// Blog Scroll Functions
async function loadBlogPosts() {
  try {
    const response = await fetch('posts.json');
    const posts = await response.json();
    const blogScroll = document.getElementById('blogScroll');
    
    // Take the latest 6 posts
    const latestPosts = posts.slice(0, 6);
    
    latestPosts.forEach(post => {
      const postCard = `
        <div class="blog-card">
          <div class="blog-date">${formatDate(post.date)}</div>
          <h3 class="blog-title">${post.title}</h3>
          <p class="blog-excerpt">${post.description || 'Read more...'}</p>
          <a href="${post.path}" class="blog-link">Read More <i class="bi bi-arrow-right"></i></a>
        </div>
      `;
      blogScroll.innerHTML += postCard;
    });
  } catch (error) {
    // Fallback to sample posts if posts.json doesn't exist yet
    const samplePosts = [
      {
        date: '2025-08-20',
        title: 'The Consolidation Pendulum: Finding Balance in an Age of Endless Reorganization',
        description: 'Corporate consolidation and government reorganization isn\'t inherently good or bad. It\'s about finding the right balance.',
        path: 'posts/2025-08-20-consolidation-balance/'
      },
      {
        date: '2025-08-04',
        title: 'The Epstein Files: Why Transparency Matters',
        description: 'Congressional battles over releasing files expose troubling priorities.',
        path: 'posts/2025-08-04-epstein-files-accountability/'
      },
      {
        date: '2025-08-01',
        title: 'Why Vote Democrat in a Red State?',
        description: 'Building a future that works for all South Carolinians.',
        path: 'posts/2025-08-01-why-vote-democrat-building-future/'
      }
    ];
    
    const blogScroll = document.getElementById('blogScroll');
    samplePosts.forEach(post => {
      const postCard = `
        <div class="blog-card">
          <div class="blog-date">${formatDate(post.date)}</div>
          <h3 class="blog-title">${post.title}</h3>
          <p class="blog-excerpt">${post.description}</p>
          <a href="${post.path}" class="blog-link">Read More <i class="bi bi-arrow-right"></i></a>
        </div>
      `;
      blogScroll.innerHTML += postCard;
    });
  }
}

function formatDate(dateString) {
  const date = new Date(dateString);
  return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' });
}

function scrollBlogs(direction) {
  const container = document.querySelector('.blog-scroll');
  const scrollAmount = 320; // Width of one card plus gap
  
  if (direction === 'prev') {
    container.scrollBy({ left: -scrollAmount, behavior: 'smooth' });
  } else {
    container.scrollBy({ left: scrollAmount, behavior: 'smooth' });
  }
}

// Load blog posts on page load
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', loadBlogPosts);
</script>
